1.Title: Wind Seeker
1.Description: When the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> hits an enemy, causing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>, the target's DEF is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> for 5s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack. When this effect is triggered, if the equipper is not the active character, they gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Spirit Lock</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. This can trigger only once per use of a skill. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Spirit Lock</color> increases the equipper's Impact by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>, lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. At full stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Spirit Lock</color>, the equipper's Impact increases by an additional <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>.
